import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Container, Nav, Navbar, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useLocation } from 'react-router' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { GlobalContext } from '../hooks/GlobalContext' const Header = () => { let location = useLocation() const { setUser, user } = useContext(GlobalContext) const logoutHandler = () => setUser('') return (
Answers {user ? ( profile Logout ) : ( Login )} About
) } export default Header
